entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -17.9°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -20.1°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
